attributes.action: To take the views of under 18's into consideration before the UK leaves the EU.
attributes.background: Under 18's have been given no say in the EU referendum. Yet it is these people who are going to be most affected. I wish for the Government to take into consideration the views of under 18's before going ahead with "Brexit".

rejection.details: It's not clear how you would like the Government to take the views of under 18s into account.
